statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsCode , AA.GoodsName , AA.BrandID , AA.CategoryID , AA.ListPrice , AA.SalePrice , AA.UseYn
, CC.BrandName , BB.CategoryName , GI.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.BGGoods AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BGCategory BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CategoryID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BGGoodsImage GI WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = GI.GoodsID AND GI.ImageType = 'GM' AND GI.ImageGroup = 'M' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.GoodsCode LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.GoodsName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.GoodsCode = #GoodsCode#
AND AA.GoodsName LIKE '%'+#GoodsName#+'%'
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
AND AA.CategoryID = #CategoryID#
AND AA.GoodsID IN ( SELECT GoodsID FROM dbo.BGGoodsAttribute WHERE AttrType = 'Age' AND AttrCode = #Age# )
AND AA.GoodsID IN ( SELECT GoodsID FROM dbo.BGGoodsAttribute WHERE AttrType = 'Gender' AND AttrCode = #Gender# )
AND AA.GoodsID IN ( SELECT GoodsID FROM dbo.BGGoodsAttribute WHERE AttrType = 'Season' AND AttrCode = #Season# )
AND AA.GoodsID IN ( SELECT GoodsID FROM dbo.BGGoodsAttribute WHERE AttrType = 'Origin' AND AttrCode = #Origin# )
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.GoodsCode , AA.GoodsName , AA.BrandID , AA.CategoryID , AA.ListPrice , AA.SalePrice , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.BGGoods AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BGGoods ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, GoodsCode, GoodsName, BrandID, CategoryID, UseYn, ListPrice, SalePrice ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #GoodsCode#, #GoodsName#, #BrandID#, #CategoryID#, #UseYn#, #ListPrice#, #SalePrice# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BGGoods SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, GoodsCode = #GoodsCode# , GoodsName = #GoodsName# , BrandID = #BrandID# , CategoryID = #CategoryID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , ListPrice = #ListPrice# , SalePrice = #SalePrice# WHERE ID = #ID#
